info.name: Clyp Hide Banners
info.description: I hate the banners on clyp, so this hides them and makes the player have a dark background as well. Meant to compliment Ovyerus's Clyp Dark Theme, which is CC BY-NC-ND, so I can't fork it.
info.additionalInfo:
update: removed suggested clyps

Meat to compliment this style: https://userstyles.org/styles/124488/clyp-dark-theme


I hate the banners on clyp, so this hides them and makes the player have a dark background as well.
